sect1.title: Build Variables
sect1.para: This method is recommended for all LiveCD based distro's.

Let's perform a sanity check to prevent build issues. If our LFS_HOST matches our target, we will get some failures during our cross-compile:

screen.userinput: if [ "${LFS_HOST}" = "${LFS_TARGET}" ]; then \ echo "Host and Target can't be the same. Use the Other Configuration Method" ; fi

sect1.para: If you received an message, "Host and Target can't be the same." You will need to use the other Configuration Method. This will prevent build issues during the early phases of the build.
